snippet: The nature of influence and political clout in New York, and many of the groups and people who hold it, is changing.
abstract: Nature of influence and political power in New York, and many of the groups and people who hold it, is changing; the New York Times reporters who cover the region identify the powerful figures on their beats and explain what gives them clout and where they fall on the chain of influence.
lead_paragraph: The nature of influence and political clout in New York, and many of the groups and people who hold it, is changing.

headline.seo: The Powers of New York: Introduction
